about_the_game:
Customize your truck with your country flag! A choice of four unique paint jobs will come handy if you feel you need to show your affiliation...

  • Flying Irish Flag
  • Irish Flag Metallic
  • Irish Flag Decal
  • Irish Harp

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.

Bonus content!

  • Leprechaun's Hat
  • Pot of Gold
  • Shamrock
detailed_description:
Customize your truck with your country flag! A choice of four unique paint jobs will come handy if you feel you need to show your affiliation...

  • Flying Irish Flag
  • Irish Flag Metallic
  • Irish Flag Decal
  • Irish Harp

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.

Bonus content!

  • Leprechaun's Hat
  • Pot of Gold
  • Shamrock

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class
  • recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably with ETS2)
  • Hard Drive: 10 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 760-class
  • recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably with ETS2)
  • Hard Drive: 10 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8+ (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT-class equivalent
  • Hard Drive: 10 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.8+ (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class or better
  • Hard Drive: 10 MB available space

short_description: Customize your truck with your country flag! A choice of four unique paint jobs will come handy if you feel you need to show your affiliation: Flying Irish Flag, Irish Flag Metallic, Irish Flag Decal, and Irish Harp.
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish, Hungarian, Czech, Romanian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Greek
